A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed this film. It is obvious\, however\, that this is a Disney movie. It relies a little too much on humor at the expense of any real tension. Overall though I enjoyed the experience. I particully found it interesting how they treated the character of Luke Skywalker. Everything he does is based on the lessons he got from Yoda in the Empire Strikes back. I found this clever\, though some fans on the internet were disappointed by this. Aside from some of the unnecessary humor\, I found this to be one of the better films in the series.
